item.title: New website!
item.description: I made another new version of my blog. Not long since I made a big update to it. Now I used next.js. I also moved the blog to the index page so it will be more noticable.
item.author: iamkamalkumar@proton.me (Kamal Kashyap)

item.title: Images in Next.js
item.description: In this article we introduce adding images in the tailwind starter blog and the benefits and limitations of the next/image component.
item.author: iamkamalkumar@proton.me (Kamal Kashyap)
